name: EcoHive
description: A cool app that helps you find eco-friendly products and rewards you for making sustainable choices. It even scores how 'green' different products are!

name: HealthSync AI
description: A smart health app that works with your smartwatch to give you tips for staying healthy and even predicts health risks before they happen.

name: MetaMaker
description: An easy-to-use tool where anyone can design their own virtual worlds for gaming, school projects, or just for fun!

name: FarmIQ
description: An app that uses smart tech to help farmers grow more crops while saving resources like water and energy.

name: NeuroLearn
description: An AI tutor that helps you learn faster, translates stuff into other languages, and creates personalized lessons just for you.
